website_summaries.verdict: Effective wipes to guard against mosquitoes. Little to no odor as compared to some mosquito sprays.
pros: Protects against a number of insects, including mosquitoes
Safe for children 6 months and older with no DEET
cons: Won't prevent mosquitoes from flying near you

customer_reviews.title: Picaridin wipes I can put in my carry-on without worrying about liquid limits.
customer_reviews.text: The world health organization recommends bug repellant products with Picaridin when traveling to countries that have a high risk of mosquito-born diseases like Zika, malaria, etc., and research shows Picaridin, while still a synthetic chemical, has less potential side-effects than DEET. I ordered these wipes for two reasons: 1) because it has Picaridin, not DEET, and 2) because you can put them in your carry-on without worrying about the TSA liquids limits. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lalla RookhTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love This Brand/Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love Avon-Skin-So-Soft-Bug-Guard. I have been using this for a few years now & it seems to be the only thing that helps with the gnats in the South. Normal bug spray/wipes really stinks but this has an ok smell so I don't mind putting it on either. They also make the spray in this brand/scent & I really like it as well. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We go through a lot of bug spray at my house and these wipes are very convenient. My toddler and baby hardly complain when I wipe them down. I usually use one wipe for my toddler, baby, and myself. They are a little pricey, but worth it for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of No-see-ums in the height of summer
customer_reviews.text: Used these when visiting Sanibel in October, when it was regularly over 90 each day, humid, and full of no-see-ums. Without this, I would get eaten alive as soon as I stepped on the beach. These kept us relatively bug-free, though sometimes I wouldn't get as good coverage and would get a couple dozen bites all over. Just be thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. The smell is nice and it feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The smell is nice and it feels good on the skin. I use it it stead of OFF. I live in florida where the mosquitos are our state bird. It's nice to put a packet in your purse for out door parties.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Trust Me - Just Try These!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! This is the first bug repellant product I’ve tried that works safely, doesn’t smell bad, and doesn’t leave your skin all greasy. I’ve tried the spay and wipe formats, and while I like and use both, the wipes are great to carry in a backpack or purse to pull out when needed and use without getting on anything else. The wipes have also been nice to share with others to use at a later time when I’m telling them how great this product is!
customer_reviews.author: A Allen

customer_reviews.title: These towelettes smell nice (not like traditional sprays)
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of picaridin as a mosquito repellent. We have a large pond in our backyard, and I am a magnet for mosquitos... These towelettes smell nice (not like traditional sprays), do not contain DEET (which I do not want to use on my body every single day of my life), and work perfectly! Now I can enjoy the backyard without feeling like I'm covered in nasty smelling chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D

customer_reviews.title: These were great in Belize
customer_reviews.text: These were great in Belize. I can't wait to try them in Florida. Easy to carry around, easy to apply, and no bug bites!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: So these are perfect for outdoors and for traveling. I always carry one around, because you never know when your going to need one, and it goes a long way. When I'm with my grandkids it's perfect, at an outdoor event in summer, I can just pull one out and wipe down, keeps the mosquitos away, no spraying, or messy creams to spread.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing seems to work for me regarding mosquitos. Nothing! Everyone swears by this so I bought 2 packages. It's no better than any bug spray as far as I'm concerned. Not saying it won't work for anyone else. I'm gonna give the apple cider vinegar method by ingesting it regularly. We'll see if that helps. I love the vinegar anyway so it can't hurt. Your product smelled good and left no icky residue so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also use the SSS sunscreen with bug guard and love it too
customer_reviews.text: These wipes have been my savior since moving to Costa Rica! They work and seem to last a long time. My husband and I can usually share one. Plus these are so portable I am always prepared. And yes, I am a mozzy magnet. I also use the SSS sunscreen with bug guard and love it too.
customer_reviews.author: CloudFlying

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and effective!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are awesome. I don't like the smell of mosquito spray, but these smell good. Kids don't mind them and the wipes are much easier to apply to kids very quickly. We don't have any problems with bites when using this!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Easy to use and smell great. Just be sure to reapply more often than you would any other product containing deet, as picardin does not last as long. Used them in Costa Rica, where the mosquitoes start coming out around sundown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LARGE towelettes for good coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Would give a five but there are so few of these towelettes in the package for the price. If you are a hiker and need to cover a lot of 'territory', this one is great! I prefer towelettes to get back of neck and ears. Plenty of moisture in a single towelette for full-body coverage or to share.
customer_reviews.author: K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and at home
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are individually packed so they make it easy to just throw into your luggage and take them with you. They are easy to use and work great. Flying bugs stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Conti

customer_reviews.title: Live in the NE; would be lost without these on the golf course
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help with black flies on the beach, but it has proven rather effective against mosquitoes on the course.
customer_reviews.author: T.L. Scarito

customer_reviews.title: Must have for tropical vacation
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and a must have for your tropical vacation. Nice smell and moisturizing for your skin without feeling greasy or breathing in aerosol fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Allena

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for visits to Florida and they work well! We like these because they work well and are in convenient travel packs. This is now our go to bug repellent for visiting places with bugs and especially mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pattilynn

customer_reviews.title: It worked!  Better than deet on smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is a bit strong but it's still much better than the deet sprays. We applied at night and can confirm it worked for at least 2 hours when we were outside camping. Not sure how long its effectivenesslast. Very easy to apply, but you may need 2 sheets if you have a lot of surface to apply.
customer_reviews.author: VBR

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: Heard great things about these but they just did not work for us. Gave them away.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for mosquitos and easier to wipe on my kids than spraying them or using lotions

customer_reviews.title: easy to take with you
customer_reviews.text: very convenient to put in car, purse. keeps mosquitoes away
customer_reviews.author: lpher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Solution to messy repellent
customer_reviews.text: So easy and convenient! I carried them all over three humid countries in my purse while traveling. Plus, they smell great.

customer_reviews.title: This works and doesn't reek or feel yukky
customer_reviews.text: Great for Caribbean travel when you only have a carry on. Smells good and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Debidoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very great for international trips on flights where the liquid restrictions pose an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Brought these on my trip to Thailand. They smell nice and they work well. The small individual baggies make them super packable too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the Bahamas and the flies and noseums did'n't light one time on me. Not a single bite....Great product and it smells heavenly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product every year. I keep my six year old grandson. I use one wipe for him and me and we have no mosquito bites!

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money, you only get 8 very ...

customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. In the garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really work. I used Skin so soft on my kids. My grandson got eaten alive. Sad. What changed?
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Traut

customer_reviews.title: Great bug protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a trip out of the country and these wipes kept the bugs away. These also worked for a camping trip in the woods. Just wish there were more in the pack. Will definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Portable, and it works

customer_reviews.text: Used these on last vacation and had no issues at all.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on our horse's face to help keep the flies away. It works very well for an hour or two then they are right back. Also pretty expensive,

customer_reviews.title: Works!

customer_reviews.title: They worked well
customer_reviews.text: I am a mosquito magnet so I wanted to take wipes on a trip to Spain for easy packing. There were mosquitoes but I didn’t get any bites. They have a pleasant scent and we’re worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how well this works. We applied ...

customer_reviews.title: Gentle mosquito repellent easy to carry with you for use anywhere

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I recommend.

customer_reviews.text: keeps bugs off and i love that i don’t have to spray it so my kids don’t inhale the fumes!

customer_reviews.title: Best mosquito and "no seeum" repellant I've ever found!
customer_reviews.text: mosquitos love me and this is the only product that I have used now, for years...especially when traveling to the islands. It's single application, does not smell bad and it absolutely does the job!

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic to take to India. I also brought some Rebel wipes, but they made my skin really angry. These were much, much gentler on my skin and kept the mosquitos away just fine.

customer_reviews.title: It was the only thing I used last time I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was the only thing I used last time I went to Puerto Rico. It works so well I thought the bugs were not biting so I left it off one day and got bug bites all over my ankles. Now I use it all the Time when I am outside.

customer_reviews.title: It was super convenient to have the pre packaged wipes
customer_reviews.text: It was super convenient to have the pre packaged wipes. Both products kept us safe from bugs and the sun without leaving an overly oily feeling on the skin.

customer_reviews.text: Living in Costa Rica (land of many insects) this product works very well and is much nicer, and more pleasant smelling, than products using Deet.

customer_reviews.title: These wipes work better for me than any other wipes I have tried
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work better for me than any other wipes I have tried. I have very bad reaction to all kinds of bug bites, so I have to wear some protection from bugs when I am outdoors. These work GREAT!

customer_reviews.title: These packaged wipes are great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These packaged wipes are great for travel. We did a lot of hiking in the rain forests of Malaysia with kids and grandkids, and they worked really well. You can use one wipe on more than one person. The odor is not unpleasant. Not cheap, but very effective.

customer_reviews.title: Love these much better than the other bug sprays
customer_reviews.text: Love these much better than the other bug sprays. Worked great in Nicaragua against the bugs/mosquitos there. Very easy to travel with and keep in a backpack. One wipe will work on your whole body ++. Some commented that they had a strong smell but it did not bother me at all. Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Love the non-spray bug Guard and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the non-spray bug Guard and it works great. My grandkids will even let me put it on them because it doesn't get in their mouths or eyes. Yea.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Safe Alternative Bug Repellant for Young Children (that WORKS)!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Avon Picaridin Bug Repellent after reading a Lucie's List article on the best/safest bug sprays for children and infants. Last year, my toddler got really bitten up by mosquitoes while camping, and was super uncomfortable (and I felt awful), as he was too young for DEET. This year, I used the wipes on both toddler and my infant (who has very sensitive skin), and neither child got a single mosquito bite (and did't seem to have any negative reactions to the wipes). The wipes also smell a lot better than most bug repellents.
customer_reviews.author: MelWalker

customer_reviews.title: it was disgusting. My toddler and husband got zero bites and ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2 year old toddler, my husband and myself on a mosquito infested hike in Hawaii. I mean INFESTED - you had to push through swarms of mosquitos, it was disgusting. My toddler and husband got zero bites and I got one. This is really really great considering I usually get tons of bites. We used 2 wipes for the three of us. Also smells really nice. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Took on our recent trip to Central America. They are easy to use and quite frankly, if you use it once and put it back in the folder into a ziplock bag, there is plenty enough solution to use twice. Loved the smell and it seemed to ward off insects. Only got bites when I didn't use the bug guard. As with any bug solution, wash your hands after using. The solution makes other things sticky like a camera. I will buy more for future trips and ditch the more familiar name brands.
customer_reviews.author: D Currin

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I've used other Avon Skin So Soft products with great results so figured these wipes would be a convenience for times when it's not practical to slather on lotion. Unfortunately the product left my legs stinging so badly, that after 1/2 hour I finally went & washed it off. (I had assumed the initial stinging sensation would dissipate as the liquid evaporates from the skin but that did not happen). My skin is not usually sensitive, no broken skin, no sunburn, no recent shave, and no problems from other Avon Skin So Soft products. Will not be using the remainder of the package, nor will I use it on my children!
customer_reviews.author: Stash Empress

customer_reviews.title: may be too moist when you open the packet but it feels cool, drys quick & keeps the bugs away for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the most effective mosquito product I have used thus far. may be too moist when you open the packet but it feels cool, drys quick & keeps the bugs away for hours. two people can share one & still get enough coverage head to toe.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Chan

customer_reviews.title: You are better off buying a bottle of spray because you go ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works against mosquitoes. The smell is pleasant enough. I am hoping it is less toxic than DEET. I used it in a very woodsy part of Wisconsin where the mosquitoes were everywhere. You are better off buying a bottle of spray because you go through the sheets pretty quickly, but these were the only skin so soft products I could find without sunscreen which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Keep One in Your Purse
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of these mosquito wipes because they're perfect. I'm one of those people who will get bitten twice even if there's only one mosquito in the area, so I keep some of these in my purse during the summer and any time I travel. These wipes also work great to soothe the itch after you've been bitten (in case you forget to put on repellent like me!). They don't leave a bad smell or sticky residue on your skin, and most importantly leave you with peace of mind. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best mosquito repellent ever
customer_reviews.text: Dang this stuff works. I bought the wipes for a trip to Bali and by the end of my trip, I was wondering what all the fuss about mosquitos was considering I hadn’t seen a single one. And I am a veritable magnet for mosquitos. I realized just how well these wipes work when the one night I forgot to use them, I was swarmed by mosquitos. I will definitely be reordering these in the future! They’re extremely effective, don’t smell bad, and don’t make my skin feel gross. Absolute lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! PROs - Wipes are good, no spray for babies/toddlers. - Very effective, it really works - Lot of liquid. You could use it on 4 kids, I think. - No bad smell or whatever - Easy to carry. CONs - None
customer_reviews.author: RTF

product_meta.title: Skin So Soft Bug Guard + Picaridin Towelettes 8's (Basic)
product_meta.description: Protects against mosquitoes, deer ticks, gnats, no-seeums, sand flies and biting midges. Self-closing reusable bag holds 8 packets. Each, 9" L x 5 1/2" W. Each, .3 fl. oz. Read and follow label directions and precautions.
